background: Wise wizard with a penchant for slipping worms into his companions' morning oats
Daydreams during the day, dreams during the night. This man is unreal because he is a fictional example of a character you can create.
Once a night guard at the royal palace, this man heard the call of adventure and now roams the country slaying beasts and digging wells for the wealthy.

This ancient automaton unearthed from some forgotten ruins does not feel. It does not eat. It does not rest. What little scholars have been able to learn about it is a partial plaque declaring it "in the house".
